user_query: in the screw top will always carry the chintiness you ever see it on a wall or in the heels of an espadrille what if love comes for everyone don't be absurd it would be remiss not to embrace the miracle it was actually much closer to a debacle it was a miracle it required forever being seated together I can't believe you're bringing this up again we're less than an hour away from partying his friends what if we're falling in love it would end in disaster what if it didn't it would bye stop this is not funny don't laugh at me please no I'm laughing because it's cute it is [Music] laughs [Music] we shouldn't exchange contact information it was very nice to meet you [Music] 14 Catalina Drive Newport Beach we're holding up the lion Frank [Music] s such as everybody foreign [Music] foreign [Music]

entities.entity_description: Frank는 대화 중 언급되는 인물로, 사자(the lion)와 관련된 장면에서 등장한다
